Shane Celis wrote:

>Maybe you could throw in a reference to JFunc, a JUnit extension, which 
>will give the tester the option of having multiple failures.
>
>http://jfunc.sourceforge.net
>

How about writing up a FAQ along the lines of "How do I use JUnit for 
functional testing?"   ;-)  

You might mention some common problems with writing functional tests 
using JUnit out-of-the-box, then how JFunc addresses those.  You could 
also cross-reference the "Why does JUnit only report the first failure 
in a single test?".

Just send me the text and I'll bring it to life in the upcoming revised FAQ.

Thanks in advance,

Mike
